getChainId().details: Returns the chain id of this.

lock(address,bytes,uint256,uint256,uint2.details: Locks the target wallet. Can only be called by the recovery owner + guardian.

POINTER.details: POINTER to create a mapping link list.

timeLock.details: timeLock keeps track of the recovery time delay. It gets set to 'block.timestamp' when 'lock' is triggered.

unlock(address,bytes,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Can only be called with the signature of the wallet's owner + recovery owner or  owner + guardian.
